head‚úù: Œ±
tail‚úù: List Œ±
(do
    let x ‚Üê
      ExceptT.run
          (ExceptT.run
            (ExceptT.run
              (ExceptT.run
                (forM (head‚úù :: tail‚úù) fun x => do
                  let x_1 ‚Üê ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (p x))))
                  let x ‚Üê
                    ExceptT.run
                        (if x_1 = true then ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (throw (some x)))))
                        else pure ())
                  match x with
                    | Except.ok x => pure x
                    | Except.error x => pure x))))
    let x ‚Üê
      match x with
        | Except.ok x => do
          let x ‚Üê
            ExceptT.run
                (match x with
                | Except.ok x => do
                  let x ‚Üê
                    ExceptT.run
                        (match x with
                        | Except.ok x =>
                          ExceptT.run
                            (match x with
                            | Except.ok x => pure x
                            | Except.error x => pure x)
                        | Except.error e => pure (Except.error e))
                  match x with
                    | Except.ok x => do
                      let x ‚Üê
                        ExceptT.run
                            (match x with
                            | Except.ok x => pure x
                            | Except.error x => pure x)
                      match x with
                        | Except.ok x =>
                          ExceptT.run
                            (forM xss fun x => do
                              let x ‚Üê
                                ExceptT.run
                                    (ExceptT.run
                                      (forM x fun x => do
                                        let x_1 ‚Üê ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (p x))))
                                        let x ‚Üê
                                          ExceptT.run
                                              (if x_1 = true then
                                                ExceptT.lift
                                                  (ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (ExceptT.lift (throw (some x)))))
                                              else pure ())
                                        match x with
                                          | Except.ok x => pure x
                                          | Except.error x => pure x))
                              let x ‚Üê
                                match x with
                                  | Except.ok x =>
                                    ExceptT.run
                                      (match x with
                                      | Except.ok x => pure x
                                      | Except.error x => pure x)
                                  | Except.error e => pure (Except.error e)
                              match x with
                                | Except.ok x => pure x
                                | Except.error x => pure x)
                        | Except.error e => pure (Except.error e)
                    | Except.error e => pure (Except.error e)
                | Except.error e => pure (Except.error e))
          match x with
            | Except.ok x => do
              let x ‚Üê
                ExceptT.run
                    (match x with
                    | Except.ok x => pure x
                    | Except.error x => pure x)
              match x with
                | Except.ok x => pure (Except.ok none)
                | Except.error e => pure (Except.error e)
            | Except.error e => pure (Except.error e)
        | Except.error e => pure (Except.error e)
    match x with
      | Except.ok x => pure x
      | Except.error x => pure x) =
  ExceptCpsT.runCatch do
    forM (head‚úù :: tail‚úù) fun x => do
        let b ‚Üê ExceptCpsT.lift (p x)
        if b = true then throw (some x) else ExceptCpsT.lift (pure ())
    forM xss fun xs =>
        forM xs fun x => do
          let b ‚Üê ExceptCpsT.lift (p x)
          if b = true then throw (some x) else ExceptCpsT.lift (pure ())
    ExceptCpsT.lift (pure none)
 
Goals accomplished! üêô

While it would be possible to override our do' notation such that its named syntax is first translated to nameless Stmt constructors and then applied to simp [Do.trans] in, for demonstration purposes we decided to encode these examples manually. In practice, the macro implementation remains more desirable as mentioned in the paper.
